title: Adam Wolfe
description: Step into the shoes of Adam Wolfe, investigator of the supernatural. Driven by your sister’s mysterious disappearance, take to the brooding streets of San Francisco, where crime and paranormal occurrences intertwine in dark corners. Solving one mystery after another, unravel a conspiracy that could lead you to your missing sibling… but may also drag you into the abyss forever. Use your wits, your detective instincts and, when all else fails, your six-shooter in this psychological thriller packed with more than 8 hours of challenging gameplay. Secret societies, unnatural afflictions and ancient covenants await you in Adam Wolfe's exciting 4 episodes! Features: - 53 unique locations - Sublime artwork - Four convoluted mysteries - Unique case-solving mechanics - Clever puzzles
